name: Don't Panic! (itch) (Josh Tulleners)
description:
Trigger Warning: Crowds, Claustrophobia, Jump scares, Screaming

This game is about the struggle of staying in control.
Controls: WASD to move  Goal: Follow the arrow, get to the end and DON'T PANIC

Don't Panic was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Credits:

All Game Art Made by Josh Tulleners (me)

Sound:

"Ambience, Large Crowd, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
Link

"Woman Scream" by MaderaDelEste Films (sironboy) of Freesound.org
